Tauranga family’s gratitude for community support after Waikite Rd house fire https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/news/tauranga-familys-gratitude-for-community-support-after-waikite-rd-house-fire/SRPDTAFFGND2BKKXHWFTHRAEUU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/news/tauranga-familys-gratitude-for-community-support-after-waikite-rd-house-fire/SRPDTAFFGND2BKKXHWFTHRAEUU/ Tom Eley'We are so grateful to be part of such a compassionate and supportive community.' Napier: Man on stolen motorbike crashes into parked car trying to avoid police checkpoint https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/napier-man-on-stolen-motorbike-crashes-into-parked-car-trying-to-avoid-police-checkpoint/THNNPNJMMBGALN5EADZR4KGOVI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/napier-man-on-stolen-motorbike-crashes-into-parked-car-trying-to-avoid-police-checkpoint/THNNPNJMMBGALN5EADZR4KGOVI/ Police initially considered it a serious crash until the man got up and started 'yelling'. Mon, 28 Oct 2024 19:13:29 +0000 Police had set up a roadside checkpoint when the man approached it about 8pm on Monday.

If they are cancelled will the taxpayer funds be lost? Photo / Mark Mitchell

Number of WorkSafe Corrections investigations labelled ‘shocking’ by union https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/number-of-worksafe- Corrections-investigations-labelled-shocking-by-union/B64K2TBQSFAEPAKWMP6M5CQ7A4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/number-of-worksafe- Corrections-investigations-labelled-shocking-by-union/B64K2TBQSFAEPAKWMP6M5CQ7A4/ Jordan DunnWorkSafe investigated two incidents out of the 152 reported by Corrections since 2014.
